lines.text: For a woman who has the sensitivity of a slut... to the point of giving her lover the identical watch she gave to her husband as an anniversary present, I will not accept lessons.
[trying to record the Devil Fish's cry]
You filthy rotten bloody shark, LET ME HEAR YOU!
He'd sit on his mother's head if he had something to gain by it.

[making a toast]
Up the shark's ass.
These don't look like the teeth marks of a shark to me.
Whatever it is, I wouldn't want to rub it the wrong way.
I can simply say, that the creature you have in your part of the ocean... is a 'living fossil'.
Bob's boat was attacked here, so I can infer that it just sits in that area.
